name: Dry Rain
description:
https://1023459.itch.io/  - Project manager (Yoshikazu Nakamura) for Dry Rain

https://sleeson3.itch.io - Code maintainer (Shane Leeson) for Dry Rain

Dry Rain, a post-apocalyptic world with emphasis on capturing the game's hard core hell fire storm,  by packing the screen with numerous adversaries who become more difficult as your score continues to grow.

You are the only surviving member of your team, the team tasked with the evaluation and cleanup after operation Dry Rain. With your orders in place and your team gone you are determined to achieve your goal. All you have is what remains of your team's plane and some basic defenses.
